description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Macedon Ranges, Australia. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Macedon Ranges Scenic Vineyard Hideaway with Daily Breakfast & Boutique Wine Tastings
hotels.description: Relax and reboot with a countryside winery escape, just an hour from Melbourne’s CBD in the glorious Macedon Ranges. Set on the edge of the heritage town of Lancefield, this hideaway is surrounded by rolling greenery and leafy vines, with a 19th-century homestead at its heart. Today, this sleek winery escape offers every modern luxury, with rooms and suites offering views of the estate's vineyards or the charming township. Unwind in sophistication with the only underground cellar door in the region, manicured gardens, more than 100 acres of vineyards and a small lake. The refined Carriage House Restaurant serves up modern farmhouse cuisine with views across the soaring Macedon Ranges. Soak up the simple pleasures of this boutique escape, explore the nearby Hanging Rock or the Lancefield & District Farmers' Market.

hotels.title: Macedon Ranges Boutique Winery Stay w. Cellar Door Tasting & Welcome Drinks
hotels.description: Relax and rejuvenate with a countryside escape, just an hour from Melbourne’s CBD, at Cleveland Winery in the glorious Macedon Ranges. Unwind in sophistication at the only underground cellar door in the region, stroll the manicured gardens and indulge at the restaurant serving modern farmhouse cuisine. Soak up the simple pleasures of this boutique escape, explore the nearby Hanging Rock and Lancefield Farmers' Market or grab a tasting paddle at Holgate Brewhouse.

seo.title: Hoteles en Macedon Ranges - Australia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Encuentra los mejores hoteles en Macedon Ranges, Australia con ofertas exclusivas. Reserva tu escapada perfecta con hasta 60% de descuento.
